name: Werebear
lore: Werebears are lycanthropes that can shift between humanoid, bear, and hybrid forms. Unlike many of their cursed kin, werebears tend toward benevolence, often acting as guardians of wild places. They live in secluded areas, far from civilization, and sometimes pass on their lycanthropy intentionallyâ€”but only to those they deem worthy.
damageImmunities: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.description: The werebear has Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

multiattack.description: The werebear makes two attacks, using Claw or Greataxe in any combination. It can replace one of those attacks with a Bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Bite (Bear or Hybrid Form Only). Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werebear lycanthropy.

savingThrow.targets: the target, if it is a Humanoid

onFailure.effects: The target is cursed with werebear lycanthropy.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Claw (Bear or Hybrid Form Only). Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14). The werebear can grapple only one creature at a time.

hit.additionalEffects: If the target is a Large or smaller creature. The werebear can grapple only one creature at a time.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.description: Greataxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only). Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) Slashing damage.

bonusActions.name: Change Shape
bonusActions.description: The werebear shape-shifts into a Large Bear, a Medium or Large Hybrid, or back to its Medium Humanoid true form. Its statistics, other than its size and Speed, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. In Bear or Hybrid form its Speed is 40 ft. and it has a Climb Speed of 30 ft. It reverts to its Humanoid form if it dies.
